attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks in the UK

rejection.details:
It's not clear if you want all fireworks to be banned, or just sales to the public. We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban sale of fireworks to the public and limit sales to licensed displays only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868

Ban all fireworks permanently, including displays: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626850
